hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:"Were it not that it would be too difficult for my Ummah, I would have commanded them to use the Siwak at (the time of) every Salah

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي السِّوَاكِ بِالْعَشِيِّ لِلصَّائِمِ
chapter.eng-name: Permitting The Usage Of Siwak In The Afternoon For One Who Is Fasting
